attributes.action: Removal of all 41 members of Commonwealth with Anti Gay Lawss
attributes.additional_details:
The following Commonwealth Countries have Anti Gay Laws many with Imprisonment, even for people who know someone who is Gay and doesn't report it.

The UK gives aid to many of these countries which should be cut and all 41 members should be removed until these laws are revoked.

Botswana (Not enforced)
Cameroon
Ghana
Kenya
Lesotho
Malawi
Mauritius
Namibia
Nigeria
Sierra Leone
Swaziland
Tanzania
